title: Must "win" 35 Normal Draft games to play ranked again
body:
To make it clear, this isnt a "POST MY LOGS" thread. I know what i say and do, but  the "win" aspect is pretty silly, should just be play 35 normal draft, similar to chat punishment.  

cant even play 35 games in a Work week, let alone win all 35.

silly GOOOOSE
